Who am I

I am a full-stack developer and a recent graduate of Thinkful Bootcamp. I am also an entrepreneur, passionate about science and technology. I have good coping skills and analytical problem-solving skills. Ability to perform detail-oriented work with a high degree of accuracy. Effective organizational and planning skills. Encourages development of long-term relationships between stakeholders and customers.

Facebook

Maps Data Specialist
Jan 2016 – Jan 2018

Data specialist for machine learning system to train Artificial Intelligence Maps for Open Street Maps (OSM). We use satellite imagery to probe data for manual and automated Road/ building detections. Review Map data quality and report findings in a meaningful result. Assist Engineers to evaluate tools such as Type ahead Search, create and present results. Train new Data Raters on the best practices on mapping, conduct one-on-one training, facilitate group meeting, and work directly with engineers to provide constructive feedback on products and new tools.
